rows.label: tlk41400072_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I see you have Blades with you.
Then I have something to ask of you.

rows.label: tlk41400072_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Please just...don't hurt us.
The common people. We are powerless
against you and your Blades...

rows.label: tlk41400072_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Those with the aptitude to be a Driver
and soldiers trained for war have the
power to oppose others, but us?

rows.label: tlk41400072_01_msg0004
rows.name:
All we want is to live our lives in peace
and quiet. Blades have taken away our
homes, our families...
